attributes.action: Create a lasting memorial to the Heroes of World War One with a staute of Harry Patch the last one to finally pass away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a spare plinth in Trafalgar Square and it would be a fitting tribute to those who gave so much in World War one if it was used to house a statue of Harry Patch the final British Citizen who fought in this conflict.
